content.description:
CHINA GDP GROWTH

Source: Bloomberg News, 2017.
content.question: Which of the following statements best describes the trend since 2010 in the graph?

choices.label: The GDP growth rate in China has remained constant.
The GDP growth rate in China has declined.
The GDP growth rate in China has increased.
The GDP growth rate in China has fluctuated substantially.

content.answer: The GDP growth rate in China has declined.

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Describe patterns and trends in data.
